chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Set) (m : Map A), lattice_bounded_def_2 A m -> forall m0 : Map A, lattice_bounded_def_2 A m0 -> lattice_bounded_def_2 A (M2 A m m0)

Premises:
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
M2 : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Map A
lattice_bounded_def_2 : forall A : Set, Map A -> Prop
lattice_bounded_7 : forall (A : Set) (a : ad) (a0 : A), lattice_bounded_def_2 A (M1 A a a0)
lattice_bounded_6 : forall A : Set, lattice_bounded_def_2 A (M0 A)
Map_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Type), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Set), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
M2_eqmap_1 : forall (A : Type) (m0 m1 m2 m3 : Map A), eqmap A (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 A m2 m3) -> eqmap A m0 m2
MapDisjoint_M2_l : forall (A B : Type) (m0 m1 : Map A) (m2 m3 : Map B), MapDisjoint A B (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 B m2 m3) -> MapDisjoint A B m0 m2
MapDisjoint_M2 : forall (A B : Type) (m0 m1 : Map A) (m2 m3 : Map B), MapDisjoint A B m0 m2 -> MapDisjoint A B m1 m3 -> MapDisjoint A B (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 B m2 m3)
M2_eqmap_2 : forall (A : Type) (m0 m1 m2 m3 : Map A), eqmap A (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 A m2 m3) -> eqmap A m1 m3
prechain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Prop), (forall m : Map A, P (single A m)) -> (forall p : prechain A, P p -> forall m : Map A, P (concat A p m)) -> forall p : prechain A, P p
in_dom_DMerge_3 : forall (A : Type) (m : Map (Map A)) (a b : ad) (m0 : Map A), MapGet (Map A) m a = Some m0 -> in_dom A b m0 = true -> in_dom A b (DMerge A m) = true
MapDisjoint_M2_r : forall (A B : Type) (m0 m1 : Map A) (m2 m3 : Map B), MapDisjoint A B (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 B m2 m3) -> MapDisjoint A B m1 m3
in_M2_disj : forall (A : Set) (a : A) (m0 m1 : Map A), (exists c : ad, MapGet A (M2 A m0 m1) c = Some a) -> (exists c : ad, MapGet A m0 c = Some a) \/ (exists c : ad, MapGet A m1 c = Some a)
mapcanon_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (y : A), P (M1 A a y)) -> (forall m1 m2 : Map A, mapcanon A m1 -> P m1 -> mapcanon A m2 -> P m2 -> 2 <= MapCard A (M2 A m1 m2) -> P (M2 A m1 m2)) -> forall m : Map A, mapcanon A m -> P m
MapGet_M2_bit_0_0 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad), N.odd a = false -> forall m m' : Map A, MapGet A (M2 A m m') a = MapGet A m (N.div2 a)
MapGet_M2_bit_0_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad), N.odd a = true -> forall m m' : Map A, MapGet A (M2 A m m') a = MapGet A m' (N.div2 a)
chain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : mEnsemble A -> mRelation A -> prechain A -> Prop), (forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> P T r (single A x)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> T y -> r x y -> P T r (concat A (single A x) y)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T y -> r x y -> chain A T r (concat A z x) -> P T r (concat A z x) -> P T r (concat A (concat A z x) y)) -> forall (m : mEnsemble A) (m0 : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), chain A m m0 p -> P m m0 p
lazy_power_eg_power : forall (A : Set) (egalite : Map A -> Map A -> bool) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), (forall a b : Map A, egalite a b = true <-> a = b) -> lazy_power A egalite f x n = power (Map A) f x n
lattice_bounded_5 : forall (p : prechain bool) (A : Set) (m0 m1 : Map A), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A (M2 A m0 m1)) lem p -> exists p0 p1 : prechain bool, sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m0) lem p0 /\ sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m1) lem p1 /\ lem (M2 bool (prechain_last bool p0) (prechain_last bool p1)) (prechain_last bool p) /\ chain_length bool p0 + chain_length bool p1 = S (chain_length bool p)
M2_canon : forall (A : Type) (m1 m2 : Map A), mapcanon A m1 -> mapcanon A m2 -> 2 <= MapCard A (M2 A m1 m2) -> mapcanon A (M2 A m1 m2)
MapDisjoint_empty_c : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> MapDisjoint A A m m -> m = M0 A
lazy_power_eg_power_0 : forall (A : Set) (egalite : Map A -> Map A -> bool) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), (forall a b : Map A, egalite a b = true <-> a = b) -> forall z : Map A, (lazy_power_aux A egalite f x n = flag_true A z -> z = power (Map A) f x n /\ z = f z) /\ (lazy_power_aux A egalite f x n = flag_false A z -> z = power (Map A) f x n)
mapcanon_M2_1 : forall (A : Type) (m1 m2 : Map A), mapcanon A (M2 A m1 m2) -> mapcanon A m1
mapcanon_M2_2 : forall (A : Type) (m1 m2 : Map A), mapcanon A (M2 A m1 m2) -> mapcanon A m2
mapcanon_M2 : forall (A : Type) (m1 m2 : Map A), mapcanon A (M2 A m1 m2) -> 2 <= MapCard A (M2 A m1 m2)
MapDomRestrBy_canon : forall (A B : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall m' : Map B, mapcanon A (MapDomRestrBy A B m m')
lattice_bounded_def_0 = fun p : prechain bool => forall (A : Set) (m0 m1 : Map A), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A (M2 A m0 m1)) lem p -> exists p0 p1 : prechain bool, sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m0) lem p0 /\ sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m1) lem p1 /\ lem (M2 bool (prechain_last bool p0) (prechain_last bool p1)) (prechain_last bool p) /\ chain_length bool p0 + chain_length bool p1 = S (chain_length bool p) : prechain bool -> Prop
makeM2 : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Map A
MapDelta : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Map A
MapMerge : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Map A
MapRemove_canon : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall a : ad, mapcanon A (MapRemove A m a)
MapDelta_canon : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A), mapcanon A m -> mapcanon A m' -> mapcanon A (MapDelta A m m')
MapMerge_canon : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A), mapcanon A m -> mapcanon A m' -> mapcanon A (MapMerge A m m')
MapPut_behind : forall A : Type, Map A -> ad -> A -> Map A
MapPut : forall A : Type, Map A -> ad -> A -> Map A
map_sum : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A), m = M0 A \/ (exists (a : ad) (x : A), m = M1 A a x) \/ (exists x y : Map A, m = M2 A x y)
MapDisjoint_empty : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), MapDisjoint A A m m -> eqmap A m (M0 A)
MapPut_behind_canon : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), mapcanon A (MapPut_behind A m a y)
MapRemove : forall A : Type, Map A -> ad -> Map A
eqmap : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Prop

unfold lattice_bounded_def_2 in *.
split.
